description: Improving the coverage and management efficiency of protected areas in the steppe biome of Russia: preparatory phase

subproject.description: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in Biodiversity focal area addressing barriers to improved management effectiveness and expansion of the steppe protected areas system of the Russian Federation.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS 4194 BD PPG: Steppe PAs

title: PPG: Steppe protected areas
